text: Megasternum is a genus of water scavenger beetles in the family Hydrophilidae. There are at least four described species in Megasternum. ==Species== * Megasternum concinnum (Marsham, 1802) * Megasternum obscurum * Megasternum posticatum (Mannerheim, 1852) * Megasternum punctulatum Horn, 1890 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:Hydrophilidae
title: Megasternum (beetle)
